mapper.sql: id, user_id, player_level, money, click_reward_base, click_multiplier, upgrade_cost, training_count, assistants_data, challenges_data, last_update_time, create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_game_data (user_id, player_level, money, click_reward_base, click_multiplier, upgrade_cost, training_count, assistants_data, challenges_data, last_update_time, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{playerLevel}, #{money}, #{clickRewardBase}, #{clickMultiplier}, #{upgradeCost}, #{trainingCount}, #{assistantsData}, #{challengesData}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_game_data SET player_level = #{playerLevel}, money = #{money}, click_reward_base = #{clickRewardBase}, click_multiplier = #{clickMultiplier}, upgrade_cost = #{upgradeCost}, training_count = #{trainingCount}, assistants_data = #{assistantsData}, challenges_data = #{challengesData}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
